  • Method Details

    • clocks

      StudiesApi.Params clocks(boolean clocks)
      Include clock comments in the PGN moves, when available. Example: 2. exd5 { [%clk 1:01:27] } e5 { [%clk 1:01:28] } Default: true

    • clocks

      default StudiesApi.Params clocks()

    • comments

      StudiesApi.Params comments(boolean comments)
      Include analysis and annotator comments in the PGN moves, when available. Example: 12. Bxf6 { [%eval 0.23] } a3 { White is in a pickle. } Default: true

    • comments

      default StudiesApi.Params comments()

    • variations

      StudiesApi.Params variations(boolean variations)
      Include non-mainline moves, when available. Example: 4. d4 Bb4+ (4... Nc6 5. Nf3 Bb4+ 6. Bd2 (6. Nbd2 O-O 7. O-O) 6... Bd6) 5. Nd2 Default: true

    • variations

      default StudiesApi.Params variations()

    • source

      StudiesApi.Params source(boolean source)
      Add a `Source` PGN tag with the study chapter URL. Example: [Source "https://lichess.org/study/4NBHImfM/1Tk4IyTz"] Default: false

    • source

      default StudiesApi.Params source()

    • orientation

      StudiesApi.Params orientation(boolean orientation)
      Add a `Orientation` PGN tag with the chapter predefined orientation. Example: [Orientation "white"] Default: false

    • orientation

      default StudiesApi.Params orientation()
